aboutMeGeneral.me: I am Alexander. I live in Dzerzhinsk, Nizhny Novgorod region. I started immersing myself in IT 4 years ago from learning C#, later moved to frontend and a year later started my career as a layout designer on a freelance exchange.
aboutMeGeneral.me2: Studied new technologies and later switched to React. I found my first job in a team, where I improved my skills in both development and communication skills in joint development to achieve common goals. He has also worked on various projects ranging from simple Django template development to a large website builder.
aboutMeGeneral.me3: I have a bachelor's degree in space information systems and technologies from NNSTU. Currently, I continue to study new technologies and best practices to write better, more maintainable and readable code. Open for new various offers, both for full-time and project work in a friendly team :). Always in touch.

first.description: Project work. Development of analogues of existing constructors using dran'n'drop to move elements.

requiredJob.1: Development of the constructor and user profile
requiredJob.3: Writing adaptive and cross-browser layout according to the layout with Figma

first.achievepments: Optimized the algorithm for updating a heavily nested object, which increased performance by ~60%

requiredJob.1: Development of product pages and category list

second.achievepments: Integrated into the main application a new part of the functionality from another application

third.description: Design work at Imex LLC, website development for employees.
third.achievepments: Improved semantics and accessibility on existing pages

1.name: Music player
1.description: Custom player for playing music. You need to insert a link in the input field, take it in the project description on GitHub.

2.name: Extension for VK spam reactions
2.description: 'Get your neighbor', when the script is enabled, the selected reaction will be put on each message of the specified user.

3.name: Extension for VK documents
3.description: Comfortable viewing of gif files, compared to the original.

4.name: Game calculator
4.description: Genshin Impact Calculator. Allows you to calculate the currency to save for future heroes and the remainder of the calculations is considered free for spending. There is also a table to track changes in the amount of currency. There is also a page for reading the game's lore. The site is fully responsive.

5.name: Games API
5.description: List of games with filtering and sorting. There are also separate pages for each game with their own information.

6.name: Internet shop
6.description: An ordinary online store with categories and subcategories. Product search, filtering, sorting, profile, shopping cart, favorite products, implemented on firebase. Responsive for all sizes.

7.name: Mobile app builder
7.description: Drag'n'drop mobile app builder with ready-made components to speed up development. There is also customization of ready-made components for the needs of the user.
